content.body: smaug: given the navigation/history rewrite it seems that should be more tractable now, in theory. I currently don't have time to investigate though.
content.formatted_body: smaug: given the navigation/history rewrite it seems that should be more tractable now, in theory. I currently don't have time to investigate though.

content.body: smaug: also, I don't like putting the "cloning steps" before append in "clone a node", but I'll do it. It seems like in theory it could result in the same kind of issues. But it's also not important for scoped custom element registries where it is done so meh for now.
